content: I've been thinking about my packing strategy for my upcoming beach vacation, and I realized that packing a few versatile pieces can go a long way - like on my last trip, I had three tops, one dress, and two bottoms that I could mix and match to create multiple outfits. I'm hoping to apply that same approach to my beach vacation. Do you have any specific tips on how to choose the right swimwear for a week-long trip?
